def palindrome(n):
    global i
    n1 = n
    rev = 0
    while n>0:
        rev = (rev*10) + (n%10)
        n /= 10
    if rev == n1:
        return n1
    else:
        i += 1
        return palindrome(n1+rev)

t = input()
global i
for l in range(t):
    n = input()
    i = 0
    ans = palindrome(n)
    print i, ans
